order.subject: Appointment of Central Public Information Officer (CPIO)
order.body: This is to notify for general information that Dr. Praveen Shukla, Deputy Librarian, NIT Agartala has been appointed as Central Public Information Officer (CPIO) of the Institute with effect from August, 01, 2025 as per the provision of RTI Act, 2005.

distributionList: Dr. Praveen Shukla, Deputy Librarian, NITA
PS to the Director for information to the Director.
